CIRCULAR NO.  16/2001 
 
 
Sub: 
Constitution of the Aerodrome Committee to deal with 
Aircraft Hijack situation. 
 
Keeping in view the operational requirement it has been decided that an officer of 
appropriate rank from the local Indian Air Force Station wherever located shall be the 
member of the Aerodrome committee at all civil airport in India.  His name, telephone 
nos. etc. shall be included in the list of the Aerodrome Committee which is issued and up-
dated from time to time by the Chairman Aerodrome Committee in consolation with the 
Station Commander, IAF at location.  
 
 
 (R.K. Singh) 
Additional Commissioner of Security (CA) 
For Commissioner of Security (CA)   
 
REF. NO.CAS-05 (1)/1997/Div-I (AC), Dated : 04.10.2001
